name: McCall Mountain Canyon Flying Seminars, LLC.
about: McCall Mountain Canyon Flying Seminars, LLC, located at the McCall Airport in McCall, Idaho, specializes in aviation safety seminars and flight training tailored for the unique environments of Idaho and Utah backcountry. Our comprehensive courses, ranging from 2 to 5 days, cover essential skills such as preparing for mountain and canyon flights, steep stabilized approaches, emergency canyon turns, and density altitude management. With certified instructors having over 140 years and 75,000+ hours of commercial flying experience, including extensive backcountry flying, we offer private, commercial, and instrument pilot training, as well as tailwheel endorsements. Our seminars are recognized worldwide and include aircraft rental options, lodging, and meals for an all-inclusive learning experience. We prioritize aviation safety and responsible use of wilderness areas, making us a premier choice for pilots seeking advanced airmanship skills.
services:

Biennial Flight Review
